argument.description: The character set to convert to.
Optional. The character set to convert from.

returnType: The CONVERT function returns a string value in particular character set. The available character sets are:
description: The Oracle/PLSQL CONVERT function converts a string from one character set to another.
sample:
CONVERT('A B C D E Ä Ê Í Õ Ø', 'US7ASCII', 'WE8ISO8859P1')
Result: 'A B C D E A E I ? ?'
